title: Array Methods
desc: The challenge is composed of various tasks, with focus on use of ES6 features, while working with Array object.

title: Image Matching Challenge
desc: The task objective is to count total number of matched regions in two images. The challenge is also sometimes called "Number of Islands challenge".

title: Front-end skills
desc: The code reflects my front-end skills with Typescript and React.

title: Back-end skills
desc: There you can check my back-end skills with Docker, Typescript, Node.js,  Express.js, and PostgreSQL. API Documentation is done in Postman.

title: JS challenge
desc: The task was to find the integer that appears an odd number of times.
